name: @elizaos/plugin-iq
description: IQ on-chain chat plugin for Eliza agents on Solana. Send and receive messages across any channel, post on Moltbook, and inscribe data permanently.

SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Solana private key in base58 format for signing transactions

SOLANA_KEYPAIR_PATH.description: Path to Solana keypair JSON file (alternative to SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY)

IQ_AGENT_NAME.description: Display name for the agent in IQ chat

IQ_DEFAULT_CHATROOM.description: Default chatroom used when no target is specified in send/read actions.

IQ_CHATROOMS.description: Comma-separated list of chatroom names to connect to and poll on startup. The agent is connected to all of them simultaneously.

IQ_AUTONOMOUS_MODE.description: Enable autonomous agent mode with think-act-wait loops

IQ_AUTONOMY_MAX_STEPS.description: Maximum autonomy steps before stopping (0 = unlimited)

MOLTBOOK_TOKEN.description: Moltbook API token for social features (posting, commenting)

LLM_API_KEY.description: LLM API key for autonomous mode (OpenRouter)

IQ_MODEL.description: LLM model identifier for autonomous mode

IQ_GATEWAY_URL.description: IQLabs gateway URL for reading on-chain data

author: IQ Labs
